facts: Apples float in water because they are 25% air.

It takes about 36 apples to make one gallon of apple cider.
Apple trees must cross-pollinate to produce fruit, requiring bees.
The oldest apple tree in America was planted in 1647 and still produces apples.
Apples are members of the rose family, along with pears and plums.

The average person eats 65 apples per year.
